018
019package org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager;
020
021import io.kubernetes.client.common.KubernetesListObject;
022import io.kubernetes.client.common.KubernetesObject;
023import io.kubernetes.client.custom.V1Patch;
024import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.ApiClient;
025import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.ApiException;
026import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.models.V1ConfigMap;
027import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.models.V1ConfigMapList;
028import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.models.V1ObjectMeta;
029import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.models.V1PersistentVolumeClaim;
030import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.models.V1PersistentVolumeClaimList;
031import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.models.V1Pod;
032import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.models.V1PodList;
033import io.kubernetes.client.util.generic.GenericKubernetesApi;
034import io.kubernetes.client.util.generic.options.PatchOptions;
035import java.util.Optional;
036
037/**
038 * Helpers for K8s API.
039 */
040@SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.ShortClassName", "PMD.UseUtilityClass" })
041public class K8s {
042
043    /**
044     * Given a groupVersion, returns only the version.
045     *
046     * @param groupVersion the group version
047     * @return the string
048     */
049    public static String version(String groupVersion) {
050        return groupVersion.substring(groupVersion.lastIndexOf('/') + 1);
051    }
052
053    /**
054     * Get PVC API.
055     *
056     * @param client the client
057     * @return the generic kubernetes api
058     */
059    public static GenericKubernetesApi<V1PersistentVolumeClaim,
060            V1PersistentVolumeClaimList> pvcApi(ApiClient client) {
061        return new GenericKubernetesApi<>(V1PersistentVolumeClaim.class,
062            V1PersistentVolumeClaimList.class, "", "v1",
063            "persistentvolumeclaims", client);
064    }
065
066    /**
067     * Get config map API.
068     *
069     * @param client the client
070     * @return the generic kubernetes api
071     */
072    public static GenericKubernetesApi<V1ConfigMap,
073            V1ConfigMapList> cmApi(ApiClient client) {
074        return new GenericKubernetesApi<>(V1ConfigMap.class,
075            V1ConfigMapList.class, "", "v1", "configmaps", client);
076    }
077
078    /**
079     * Get pod API.
080     *
081     * @param client the client
082     * @return the generic kubernetes api
083     */
084    public static GenericKubernetesApi<V1Pod, V1PodList>
085            podApi(ApiClient client) {
086        return new GenericKubernetesApi<>(V1Pod.class, V1PodList.class, "",
087            "v1", "pods", client);
088    }
089
090    /**
091     * Get an object from its metadata.
092     *
093     * @param <T> the generic type
094     * @param <LT> the generic type
095     * @param api the api
096     * @param meta the meta
097     * @return the object
098     */
099    public static <T extends KubernetesObject, LT extends KubernetesListObject>
100            Optional<T> get(GenericKubernetesApi<T, LT> api, V1ObjectMeta meta)
101                    throws ApiException {
102        var response = api.get(meta.getNamespace(), meta.getName());
103        if (response.isSuccess()) {
104            return Optional.of(response.getObject());
105        }
106        return Optional.empty();
107    }
108
109    /**
110     * Delete an object.
111     *
112     * @param <T> the generic type
113     * @param <LT> the generic type
114     * @param api the api
115     * @param object the object
116     */
117    public static <T extends KubernetesObject, LT extends KubernetesListObject>
118            void delete(GenericKubernetesApi<T, LT> api, T object)
119                    throws ApiException {
120        api.delete(object.getMetadata().getNamespace(),
121            object.getMetadata().getName()).throwsApiException();
122    }
123
124    /**
125     * Apply the given patch data.
126     *
127     * @param <T> the generic type
128     * @param <LT> the generic type
129     * @param api the api
130     * @param existing the existing
131     * @param update the update
132     * @throws ApiException the api exception
133     */
134    public static <T extends KubernetesObject, LT extends KubernetesListObject>
135            T apply(GenericKubernetesApi<T, LT> api, T existing, String update)
136                    throws ApiException {
137        PatchOptions opts = new PatchOptions();
138        opts.setForce(false);
139        opts.setFieldManager("kubernetes-java-kubectl-apply");
140        var response = api.patch(existing.getMetadata().getNamespace(),
141            existing.getMetadata().getName(), V1Patch.PATCH_FORMAT_APPLY_YAML,
142            new V1Patch(update), opts).throwsApiException();
143        return response.getObject();
144    }
145
146}
